extraDescription: Services to provide independent consultation and strategic advice and discussion on the Treasury Board Secretariata??s Policy Suite Reset initiative and its impact on the public service management agenda.
comments: This contract was sole-sourced. This contract is with a former public servant in receipt of a pension under the Public Service Superannuation Act. This contract is a multi-year contract.
